parameters.name: severitySelector
parameters.label: Severity
parameters.query:
QualysHostDetection
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| distinct Sev
| sort by Sev desc

content.query:
QualysHostDetection
|  extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| where isnotempty(Sev)
| summarize ['5 - Urgent'] = countif(Sev == "5"), ['4 - Critical'] = countif(Sev == "4"), ['3 - Serious'] = countif(Sev == "3"), ['2 - Medium'] = countif(Sev == "2"), ['1 - Minimal'] = countif(Sev == "1"),  count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| project-away count_
content.title: Detections by Severity Timeline

content.query:
QualysHostDetection
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Status = tostring(Status)
| summarize count() by Status
content.title: Detection Status

content.query:
let data = QualysHostDetection
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| extend Vulnerability = tostring(QID)
| extend Severity = case(Sev == "5", "5 - Urgent", Sev == "4", "4 - Critical", Sev == "3", "3 - Serious", Sev == "2", "2 - Medium", Sev == "1", "1 - Minimal", " ")
| extend Status = tostring(Status)
| where Status == "Re-Opened"
| summarize count() by Sev, Severity, Vulnerability ;
let topUrgent = data 
| where Sev == "5"
| top 10 by count_;
let topCritical = data
| where Sev == "4"
| top 10 by count_;
let topSerious = data
| where Sev == "3"
| top 10 by count_;
let topMedium = data
| where Sev == "2"
| top 10 by count_;
let topMinimal = data
| where Sev == "1"
| top 10 by count_;
union topUrgent, topCritical, topSerious, topMedium, topMinimal
| project-away Sev
| sort by Severity, count_ desc
| project-rename Total = count_
content.title: Top 10 Re-Opened Vulnerabilities by Severity

content.query:
let data = QualysHostDetection
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| extend Vulnerability = tostring(QID)
| extend Severity = case(Sev == "5", "5 - Urgent", Sev == "4", "4 - Critical", Sev == "3", "3 - Serious", Sev == "2", "2 - Medium", Sev == "1", "1 - Minimal", " ")
| extend Status = tostring(Status)
| where Status == "New" and Sev in ("5", "4")
| summarize count() by Sev, Severity, IPAddress, DnsName;
let topUrgent = data 
| where Sev == "5"
| top 10 by count_;
let topCritical = data
| where Sev == "4"
| top 10 by count_;
union topUrgent, topCritical
| project-away Sev
| sort by Severity, count_ desc
| project-rename Total = count_
content.title: Top 10 Host with New Urgent/Critical Vulnerabilities

content.query:
let data = QualysHostDetection
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| extend Vulnerability = tostring(QID)
| extend Severity = case(Sev == "5", "5 - Urgent", Sev == "4", "4 - Critical", Sev == "3", "3 - Serious", Sev == "2", "2 - Medium", Sev == "1", "1 - Minimal", " ")
| extend Status = tostring(Status)
| where Status == "Re-Opened" and Sev in ("5", "4")
| summarize count() by Sev, Severity, IPAddress, DnsName;
let topUrgent = data 
| where Sev == "5"
| top 10 by count_;
let topCritical = data
| where Sev == "4"
| top 10 by count_;
union topUrgent, topCritical
| project-away Sev
| sort by Severity, count_ desc
| project-rename Total = count_
content.title: Top 10 Host with Re-Opened Urgent/Critical Vulnerabilities

content.query:
QualysHostDetection
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where isnotempty(Sev)
| summarize ['5 - Urgent'] = countif(Sev == "5"), ['4 - Critical'] = countif(Sev == "4"), ['3 - Serious'] = countif(Sev == "3"), ['2 - Medium'] = countif(Sev == "2"), ['1 - Minimal'] = countif(Sev == "1"),  count() by OperatingSystem
| project-rename Total = count_
| sort by Total desc 
| top 10 by Total
content.title: Top Total Detections by Operation System

| extend Vulnerability = tostring(QID)

| top 10 by count_;

parameters.name: Vuln
parameters.label: Vulnerability Detected
parameters.query:
QualysHostDetection
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| extend Vuln = tostring(QID)
| distinct Vuln

content.query:
QualysHostDetection
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Vuln = tostring(QID)
| where Vuln in ("{Vuln}") or '*' in ("{Vuln}")
| summarize ['5 - Urgent'] = countif(Sev == "5"), ['4 - Critical'] = countif(Sev == "4"), ['3 - Serious'] = countif(Sev == "3"), ['2 - Medium'] = countif(Sev == "2"), ['1 - Minimal'] = countif(Sev == "1"),  count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| project-away count_
content.title: Detection Timeline

content.query:
QualysHostDetection
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Status = tostring(Status)
| extend Vulnerability = tostring(QID)
| where Vulnerability in ("{Vuln}") or '*' in ("{Vuln}") 
| summarize count() by Status
content.title: Detection Status

content.query:
QualysHostDetection
| where OperatingSystem in ({OperatingSystem}) or '*' in ({OperatingSystem})
| extend Sev = tostring(Severity)
| where Sev in ({severitySelector}) or '*' in ({severitySelector})
| extend Vulnerability = tostring(QID)
| where Vulnerability in ("{Vuln}") or '*' in ("{Vuln}")
| summarize Total = count() by IPAddress, DnsName
| sort by Total desc
content.title: Host(s) with Vulnerability Detected
